title: Flexible Information Utilization Project-Based Education for Medical Practitioners

context.prior_knowledge: Basic medical terminology and research methodology comprehension
context.additional_context: Strengthening competencies to analyze and utilize real medical information encountered by current professionals in their work

learning_goals: Learners can select materials suitable for medical practice by comparing and analyzing diverse information sources (print/digital)
Learners develop strategies to integrate library/online resources for project-based task performance
Learners apply information retrieval and evaluation skills through flexible learning methods (asynchronous lectures, optional practicums)
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
